website_summaries.verdict: The Vaider by Supra works for both athletics and lifestyle sections. While looking equally fashionable off the board, it appears with heel and ankle reinforcements made of a generous amount of cushioning to deliver reliable support and comfort while on the board.Plus, the brand nicely incorporated high-quality materials with its overall straightforward and stylish design offered at a budget-friendly price.
pros: The majority of users like the timeless look of the Supra Vaider
Several skaters praise the flexibility of this shoe
Most users compliment the comfortable strides they experienced with the Supra Vaider
Quite a few reviewers cite about the excellent board feel of this shoe
Many reviewers mention the high-quality materials used in this pair
Several users reveal that this shoe fits them perfectly
A handful like that this pair looks better in the actual
According to several Supra Vaider reviews, this pair comes at a wallet-friendly price point
Few Thrashers like the extra lace slip that protects the laces from ripping
This shoe delivers ample ankle support, as shared by many skateboarders
cons: Several disappointed buyers complain about the unreliable durability of the Supra Vaider sneaker
A couple of users do not like that this pair needs break-in time
Few disclose that this pair has insufficient arch support and ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great looking but, super cheap materials and bad quality do not justify the price. If you remove the very thin insert there is no padding of any kind, it is seriously your foot against the sole. As others mentioned the stitching was all over the place and the eye holes were not lined up correctly. If you want a better shoe with the same build quality get a pair of Chuck Taylor Converse. Better build at a lower price and at least with Cons you know what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Great All around
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of Vaiders Black and White , great materials on these pair , leather like for the general black red rubber bottoms with a good build all around .... I will be using these to work at a restaurant rubber sole is great as a slip resistant and I use my board to commute ... it’s a win win !!!
customer_reviews.author: c0deName_ZERO

customer_reviews.title: Good solid skate shoes. Money isn’t spent on marketing, it’s spent on quality.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Supras after 25 years of wearing skate shoes, with 20 years of wearing DCs. I’m using these as bicycling shoes, and they’re great. The leather holds its form, the laces are thick and stay in place. The sole is really solid rubber, and provides effortless drive to my pedals with no loss of force. I’d recommend these as everyday shoes, they’re mine now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Subpar. If its too good to be true, it probably is.
customer_reviews.text: I use special orthopedic inserts for my shoes so i was able to disregard the very true complaints about the soles inserts that come in these shoes (they are paper thin). After taking them out i notice a small rip in the lining between the inner part of the shoe and the sole where the red is visible. My insert is thick enough for me to get by without feeling it though. Overall the shoe is good but its almost like all the shoes, based on others experience too, were rejected from storefronts because of subpar/brand quality hence the price cut. I bet if i paid the $120 at zumies for the shoe it would be mint though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great skating shoe 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: It’s a supra shoe always has been one of my favorite shoes. They have good ankle support and great grip. Good for cruising around on a board or also great for doing tricks as well. They are flexible so you can get good scoops in on your board for the shuvits and any other trick involving a scoop. Have been skating this pretty hard and they’ve still been holding up just the regular wear and tear but all the stitching is still in place and no sole or side seperation.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit and minimal arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for lifting. Comfortable, look good, and breath exceptionally well. I have very flat feet and prefer minimal arch support. Overall, I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer baker

customer_reviews.title: I love the black with red bottoms!
customer_reviews.text: My 1st pair was years ago! I wore them until there were holes lol now I got the same 1’s new :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Supra shoes. They look great they feel great. I will continue to buy them. Hopefully getting a custom pair one day
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: but the price was amazing and I think I'm skating better
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for skateboarding, and they have worked out incredible. They kind of give me 'frankenstein' feet, but the price was amazing and I think I'm skating better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I totally like this shoes! Good feel, good look and decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Dee Riego

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much really strong. Fits perfect. Looks perfect. Will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Durable, stylish, comfortable, not too hot either.
customer_reviews.text: Laces do not come loose even if untied. I have to adjust by pulling on each loop every time to remove or put on my shoes, they are perfect and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Supras!
customer_reviews.text: The 9 1/2 I purchased, fits well, however I could have used a 9. It seems like Supra might run little larger than normal sneakers, or my feet have shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Daughety

customer_reviews.title: Really nice 👌
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, just what I expected, I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Nasaet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, quality shoes, could not ask for more. Thanks and keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: javier diaz

customer_reviews.title: the price and fit
customer_reviews.text: my son liked these sneakers and plan on buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: diana bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very well made this is my second ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Monday got Saturday. Great fit, very well made this is my second pair of supra sneakers I love them. The price is great. I love black mid top sneakers. Amazing deal
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Great kinda
customer_reviews.text: They came almost next day but had a few scuff marks but nothing that was permanent damage still look fly af
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but arrived marked up
customer_reviews.text: Got the shoes today but there's black marks all over the shoes, both on the leather and the fabric. Whole point of ordering new white shoes that they would be clean and white. Wouldn't recommend ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys Cranfield

customer_reviews.title: VERY long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great very very durable shoe. Been through snow, mud, rain and everything in between but it doesn’t let up. Be aware there is no arch support and the shoe is flat. These are skateboarding shoes after all so know what you’re buying. That being said I haven’t had any problems on long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Supra Unisex Adults' Vaider Skateboarding Shoes
